section.section: A proposal for annexation of an area to the regional district shall be initiated by a written petition.

The written petition shall be signed by:
at least 25% of the residents of the area to be annexed who are registered as voters in county elections; and
owners of at least 25% of the assessed valuation of the real property located in the area to be annexed.

text.section:
If a written petition for annexation is submitted to the County Council, the chair of the County Council shall verify:
the signatures on the written petition; and
that the petition meets the requirements of subsection (a)(2) of this section.
